title: Aztec Financial Selects LeaseWave From Odessa Technologies
text:
Aztec Financial Selects LeaseWave From Odessa Technologies July 30, 2015, 07:10 AM Related: LeaseWave , llc , Odessa 
Aztec Financial, LLC has selected LeaseWave from Odessa Technologies to deliver a centralized, end-to-end lease management solution. Aztec is a leading provider of equipment and vehicle financing to specialty contractors in industries including cleaning and restoration services, surface preparation, janitorial, safety, and abatement.“Having outgrown our existing systems, we were looking for a sophisticated solution that could accommodate our unique business needs as well as enable future growth,” said John Sirrine, President, Aztec Financial. “We selected LeaseWave after a thorough evaluation of lease management solutions, which further strengthened our belief that Odessa Technologies was the right technology partner for us.”“We are pleased that Aztec has chosen to switch to LeaseWave,” said Madhu Natarajan, CEO, Odessa Technologies. “By consolidating all front and back office processes onto one singular platform with LeaseWave, Aztec will be able to leverage our workflow-driven design and configurable automation capabilities. This will eliminate manual workarounds and improve process efficiency, enabling Aztec to continue offering creative financial solutions to their customers.” Today's Other News
